member.name: T:Alphaleonis.Win32.Vss.VssImplementation
member.summary: Represents a platform specific implementation of the global methods in the VSS API.
member.remarks: An instance of this class can either be created directly, or by using the factory methods in to obtain an instance of the interface for the current platform.

member.name: M:Alphaleonis.Win32.Vss.VssAsyncResult.Finalize
member.summary: Releases resources used by the object.
